backend.package.json: Dependencies and scripts for Node.js/Express backend
backend.server.js: Main Express server setup with MongoDB connection
backend.models/User.js: Mongoose schema definition for User entity
backend.models/Project.js: Mongoose schema definition for Project entity
backend.controllers/userController.js: Business logic and CRUD operations for User
backend.controllers/projectController.js: Business logic and CRUD operations for Project
backend.routes/users.js: API endpoints and route handlers for User
backend.routes/projects.js: API endpoints and route handlers for Project

frontend.package.json: React dependencies including Zustand, Axios, Tailwind
frontend.public/index.html: Root HTML template with proper meta tags
frontend.src/main.jsx: React DOM root and app initialization
frontend.src/store/appStore.js: Zustand global state management for application state
frontend.src/api/apiService.js: Axios configuration and API functions for backend communication
frontend.src/components/Header.jsx: Reusable UI component for header section
frontend.src/components/Footer.jsx: Reusable UI component for footer section
frontend.src/components/ProjectCard.jsx: Reusable UI component for project cards
frontend.src/hooks/useCustomHook.js: Custom React hooks for logic reuse
